version_description:
➤ Experience 5 separate campaigns with 145 separate missions based on the actual beach landings; Juno, Sword, Utah, Gold and Omaha.
➤ New Skill based star rewards for missions – collect them for bonuses!
➤ Quadzooka!!!
➤ Player can now use Artillery Strikes to destroy all nearby enemies.
➤ Now includes Game Center Achievements!
➤ Final campaign missions take place in Special Locations!
➤ Daily Bonus!
➤ Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

▶ Battle the world and win prizes in new weekly special events!
▶ New village assault map raises competition to new levels!
▶ More spy sightings! Defeat spies during special events for bonus rewards!
▶ Shock and contaminate your enemies with the new Teslacoil and X-Ray Projector Bureau weapons!
▶ Equip awesome new battle helmets with destructive special effects! Fire, frost, explosive, chaos and more!
▶ By popular demand – Now upgrade your traditional weapons!
▶ New seasonal content! Marvel at the devastating effects of the flaming pumpkin helmet while battling the evil axis pumpkin head division!
▶Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
